original: 弘農華陰人，西晉官員，楊駿之弟。以武藝出眾而著稱。曾數度勸諫兄長楊駿，但皆不被採納。後八王之亂，賈南風誅殺楊駿，夷三族，楊濟因而被殺。
text: Hongnong Huayin, official of the Western Jin Dynasty, younger brother of Yang Jun. Known for his outstanding martial arts. I have advised my brother Yang Jun on several occasions, but they have not been accepted. After the Eight Kings Rebellion, Janan Feng killed Yang Jun and the Yi tribe, and Yang Ji was killed.
